prod_short_desc: It’s feeding time down at the animal farm!
prod_long_desc:
Jump in the pickup and drive with Mia to the LEGO® Friends farm to feed the animals, featuring a stable with opening gate, pen, wheelbarrow, hay bales and assorted food elements and farmyard tools. Help children learn to care for and nurture the animals with this easy-to-carry suitcase play set. LEGO Juniors is an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 4-7. Includes a Mia mini-doll figure, plus foal and lamb figures.
Includes a Mia mini-doll figure, plus foal and lamb figures.
Features an Easy to Build farm pickup vehicle with rear storage area, stable with opening gate for the foal and a pen for the lamb.
Deliver food to the farm in the pickup.
Help the animals stay healthy by keeping the farm clean and tidy with the tool elements.
Keep the lamb nourished with the feeding bottle.
Open the gate to let the foal run around.
Encourage children to learn how to care for animals.
Easy to Build model with bigger pieces and a simple guide to get kids building and playing quickly.
Accessory elements include a carrot with food bin, apple, wheelbarrow, comb, feeding bottle, shovel, rake, water tap, two ribbons, red and green flowers, bowl and four hay bales.
The LEGO® Juniors suitcase lets you build and play on the move.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 4-7.
Suitcase measures over 10” high, 11” wide and 2” long.
Pickup vehicle measures over 1” high, 3” long and 1” wide.
Stable measures over 3” high, 3” wide and 4” long.
